context:
### Idiom: 反朴归真
### Meaning: 反通返”，回；朴质朴；归返回；真天然，自然。去掉外饰，还其本质。比喻回复原来的自然状态。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: (VCG)日前杨婉仪在IG分享与女儿Hannah一齐睇樱花的相片，下月便满18岁的Hannah真是女大十八变，年前转戴隐形眼镜弃做‘四眼妹’，将头发染红、染绿又染金；今趟反朴归真染回黑色望落更顺眼，加上箍牙已一段时间，渐见成效，她毫不介意露齿一笑，望落跟妈咪99%‘倒模样’，十分相似，难怪杨婉仪不时以‘mini me’称呼Hannah杨婉仪更是卅年如一日无变样，以英文写道：‘美丽的樱花’。
target: (VCG) A few days ago, Wanyi Yang shared a photo on IG of watching cherry blossoms with her daughter Hannah. Hannah, who will be 18 years old next month, has really transformed into a woman. A few years ago, she switched to wearing contact lenses and gave up being a "four-eyed girl" and dyed her hair red. , dyed green and then dyed gold; this time, she went back to her true colors and dyed her hair black, which is more pleasing to the eye. She has been wearing braces for a while, and the results are gradually showing. She doesn’t mind grinning, and her look looks exactly like mommy 99% of the time. ', very similar. No wonder Yang Wanyi calls Hannah 'mini me' from time to time. Yang Wanyi has remained the same for thirty years and wrote in English: 'Beautiful cherry blossoms'.

context:
### Idiom: 称心满意
### Meaning: 心满意足。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 去日本学语言，九州外国语学院怎么样？现在找工作比较困难，想要找到一份自己称心满意的工作更是难上加难。在选择语言学校时，不仅要考虑到费用，地址，还有学校如何等等，于是很多学生和家长就被弄晕了。
target: Going to Japan to study language, how is Kyushu Foreign Language Academy? Nowadays, finding a job is quite difficult, and it's even more challenging to find a job that one is satisfied with. When choosing a language school, one not only needs to consider the cost and location, but also how the school is and so on, so many students and parents are overwhelmed.

context:
### Idiom: 筋疲力尽
### Meaning: 筋肉疲乏，体力竭尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 像野性的天使 ，刚筋疲力尽地。完成一场打谷——永恒是打谷完的天色——
target: Like a wild angel, just exhausted. Complete a threshing session - eternity is the sky after the threshing session -

context:
### Idiom: 死生有命，富贵在天
### Meaning: 指万事皆由天命注定。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 司马光云：“死生有命，富贵在天。”
target: Sima Guang said: "Life and death are predestined, wealth and honor are in heaven."

context:
### Idiom: 深谷为陵
### Meaning: 深谷变成山陵。常喻人世间的重大变迁。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 武汉毕业照拍摄 在宇宙的征途中，每颗星都有自己的轨迹，在生命的博弈里，每个人都有自己的棋局，高岸为谷，深谷为陵，愿你遵循自己的发展时区，以梦为马，披荆斩。
target: Peking Opera shooting

context:
### Idiom: 遥遥无期
### Meaning: 形容达到目的、实现理想的时间还相距很远。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 2014年1月15日，杨碧川出席国家人权博物馆筹备处新书发表会，他说，拿笔写历史是他唯一能表达对不义政权永远的反抗，“我们要把这个精神留做历史的见证，历史是这样写的，历史是有这么多人用性命跟青春换来，这段历史不能忘记；但忘记历史是统治者的本领，他们教我们放弃历史的思考，只让我们向前看”。2020年8月16日，杨碧川表示，他相当尊敬的已故越南民主共和国主席胡志明曾说，必须先追求越南独立，独立之后越南才有可能实践马克思主义；如果台湾人民不能抱持“一边抗战、一边建国”之理念，台湾独立遥遥无期；如果他逝世以前台湾仍未独立，他“要站著死，也不要躺著死”。详见台湾组合资料库。
target: On January 15, 2014, Yang Jie-Pang attended the launch of the National Humanities Museum's new book, where he said, "We should keep this spirit as a witness of history, history is written this way, history is worth many people's life and youth, this history cannot be forgotten; but forgetting history is the skill of the ruler, they taught us to abandon our reflection on history, only let us look forward." On August 16, 2020, Yang Jie-Pang said, if the people of Taiwan do not maintain the concept of "one side fighting, one side building", Taiwan's independence will never be achieved; if Taiwan's independence is not achieved by his death, he will "die standing, not lie down." See Taiwan Combo Archives.

context:
### Idiom: 能伸能屈
### Meaning: 能弯曲也能伸直。指人在失意时能忍耐，在得志时能大干一番。比喻好坏环境都能适应。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 还得是咱颜淡机灵，打不过就怂，靠山来了就横，真的是能伸能屈啊。笑不活了！
target: We have to be modest, but if we are beaten, we will be timid. We will be arrogant if we have backing. This is really funny!

context:
### Idiom: 丢三落四
### Meaning: 形容马虎或记忆力不好而顾此失彼。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 智博资讯。比方孩子刚刚入学的时分，经常丢三落四，通常家长的第一反响就是立即给孩子送到学校。家庭教育的15个“怎么办”，父母一定要好好看！
target: Zhi Bo Information. For example, when a child just starts school, they often lose things and forget stuff. The first reaction of parents is usually to immediately send the child to school. There are 15 "what to do" in family education, parents must take a good look!

context:
### Idiom: 斗鸡走狗
### Meaning: 使公鸡相斗，使狗赛跑。指旧时剥削阶级子弟游手好闲的无聊游戏。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 地主家的傻儿子，每天斗鸡走狗，专门去调戏良家钶睿。
target: The landlord's foolish son, every day cockfighting and dog racing, specifically goes to tease virtuous and intelligent women.

context:
### Idiom: 国而忘家
### Meaning: 指为国事而忘其家。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 力争停止，正直声誉名震海内。陞工部员外郎，奉命督理徐淮中河，其时河道淤塞，漕运被阻，他引黄河自封丘金龙口与汶水合六，经过徐吕二洪南入淮漕，河漕因此通行无阻；汴口决堤，二百里内城墙屋舍毁坏、男女溺死不计其数，他亲自相度水势巡视修筑，数个月后增厚的堤防就建成，因癯病辞官，此前漕运总督的荐书有“俭以持身，勤以任事，总河有河漕，两利国而忘家。”的句子。
target: Striving to stop, his integrity and reputation are well-known across the nation. He was promoted to the position of Assistant Minister of Public Works and was ordered to supervise the rivers in Xu and Huai. At that time, the river channels were silted up and the canal transportation was blocked. He diverted the Yellow River from Fengqiu Jinlongkou to merge with Wen River, passing through Xu and Lv, and entered Huai Canal in the south. As a result, the river canal was unobstructed. When the dike at Biankou broke, the city walls and houses within two hundred miles were destroyed, and countless men and women drowned. He personally measured the water conditions and supervised the construction. A few months later, the thickened embankment was built. Due to illness, he resigned from his official position. The recommendation letter from the previous Canal Transport Governor included the sentence, "He maintains a frugal lifestyle, diligently performs his duties, manages the river and canal, benefits the country and forgets his own family."

context:
### Idiom: 白眼相看
### Meaning: 看别人时眼睛朝上或旁边，现出白眼珠，表示轻蔑，不屑一顾，对人不礼貌。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 【平常语·甘露味】不要怪生活有时候会故意拉长了脸，冷嘲热讽，白眼相看。生活真的想给机会让你明白，这世间风一阵雨一阵，烦恼一直有去有来，旧的放下，新的又捡起，没有什么能一直存在。
target: 【Common language: Sweet dew】Don't blame life for sometimes stretching its face, sarcasm, and white eyes. Life really wants to give you a chance to understand that this world is gusty and rainy, and worries always come and go. Old things are put down and new things are picked up. There is nothing that can last forever.

context:
### Idiom: 随地随时
### Meaning: ①指依照当时当地情形；在不同的时间、地点。②任何时间、地点；时时处处。同随时随地”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 复古传奇是一款全新打怪升级的传奇手机游戏，地图场面多方面打开3D实景方式，能够达成全局灵活观看和随地随时的地方传送。
target: The Ancient Romance is a newly-upgraded fighting game, the map scene is open in 3D real-world, allowing for flexible viewing and sending to anywhere at any time.

context:
### Idiom: 撒科打诨
### Meaning: 穿插在戏曲表演中，使观众发笑的动作与道白。亦泛指引人发笑的言语、动作。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 说实话回天现在看来写得确实不行，写那么多章了都还没点明主线，反派莫名其妙的出场，攻和配角整天撒科打诨，沈酌开头还是从头到尾都高岭之花不爱搭理人后面也突然开始和攻他们说些莫名其妙的玩笑话，很多东西好像只是为了出场而出场没什么特别的深意，怀疑淮下写攻整天倒油就是为了凑字数。
target: To be honest, Huitian seems to be written really poorly at the moment. After writing so many chapters, the main line is still not clearly stated. The appearance of the villain is mysterious, and the attackers and supporting characters are always joking around. At the beginning, Shen Zhuoyao is a high-flowering flower that doesn't love to talk to people, but later, he suddenly starts to make inexplicable jokes with the attackers. It seems that many things are just appearing for the sake of appearing, without any special significance. I suspect that Huai Xia wrote the attackers to pour oil all day just to make up the words.

context:
### Idiom: 盛衰荣辱
### Meaning: 兴盛、衰败、荣耀、耻辱。指人事变化发展的各种情况。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 前总统马英九日前以祭祖名义前往中国大陆访问12天，并且参访抗战遗址和纪念设施，当他赴湖南衡山‘南岳忠烈祠’祭拜时，也意外让台湾民众发现，原来对岸也有一座‘忠烈祠’。而且‘南岳忠烈祠’还曾经是‘国家级’的忠烈祠，当国民政府即将退守台湾之际，中枢最后一次的国殇大典是在这里举办，也曾经被人为毁坏3次，可以说是看尽中华民国在大陆时期的盛衰荣辱。七七卢沟桥事变爆发，日军全面侵华，历经淞沪会战、南京保卫战、徐州会战到武汉会战之后，中国半壁江山，也就是最精华地区，已落入日军敌手，然而蒋中正没有屈服，将国民政府迁至重庆继续抗战，中日两军开始进入相持阶段。
target: Former President Ma Ying-jeou visited mainland China for 12 days recently under the pretext of ancestral worship, and visited wartime sites and memorial facilities. When he paid homage at the "South Yue Loyal Martyrs Shrine" in Hengshan, Hunan, he unexpectedly revealed to Taiwanese citizens that there is also a "Loyal Martyrs Shrine" on the other side. Moreover, the "South Yue Loyal Martyrs Shrine" was once a "national" loyal martyrs shrine. When the National Government was about to retreat to Taiwan, the last national mourning ceremony held by the central government was held here, and it has also been destroyed by humans three times, witnessing the prosperity, decline, honor, and disgrace of the Republic of China on the mainland. When the July 7 Lu Gou Bridge Incident broke out, the Japanese army invaded China on a full scale, going through the battles of Songhu, Nanjing, Xuzhou, and Wuhan, the best part of China, that is, the most essential area, has fallen into the hands of the Japanese army. However, Chiang Kai-shek did not yield, and moved the National Government to Chongqing to continue the war. The Chinese and Japanese armies began to enter the stalemate stage.

context:
### Idiom: 决一雌雄
### Meaning: 一决胜负。雌雄，比喻胜负、高下。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 随着两派矛盾的激化，源治和芹泽两大乌鸦军团决一雌雄的时候即将到来…
target: As the conflict between the two factions intensifies, the time is approaching for the two great crow legions of Yuen Chi and Qin Ze to determine supremacy...

context:
### Idiom: 不足挂齿
### Meaning: 不值得一提。语出《汉书·叔孙通传》：“此特群盗鼠窃狗盗，何足置齿牙间哉？”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 夏日祝福传球开始啦，快接住：祝你生活丰衣足食；烦恼不足挂齿；好运时时充足；工作足智多谋；人生知足常乐；踢走郁闷球；踢跑疲倦球；踢好快乐球！
target: Here comes the summer blessing pass, catch it quickly: Wishing you a life of abundance, little to no worries, constant good luck, wise and resourceful work, contentment in life, kicking away the ball of sadness, running away from the ball of fatigue, and kicking the ball of happiness well!

context:
### Idiom: 万马齐喑
### Meaning: 喑，哑。众马都沉寂无声。语本宋苏轼《三马图赞》序：“时西域贡马……振鬣长鸣，万马皆瘖。”后用以比喻人们都沉默，不敢发表意见。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 他的一些感时伤世的诗句，继承了我国古代文人墨客和士大夫讽喻朝政、刺世嫉邪的傲岸风骨，如写于1958年的《任凭风雨》，写于1960年的《纪念杜少陵七首》，写于1961年的《端阳节悼屈原三首》，还有写于1971年的《咏史三首》，其中诸多名句，像“世事纷纭多变幻，人情翻覆似波澜。九秋枫叶经霜艳，腊月松枝带雪寒”，与龚自珍“九州生气恃风雷，万马齐喑究可哀”，谭嗣同“四万万人齐下泪，天涯何处是神州”，鲁迅“忍看朋辈成新鬼，怒向刀丛觅小诗”等佳句一脉相承，令人荡气回肠。。。然而，带有这种批判色彩的诗句，自20世纪50年代以来，已在我国文坛上悄然绝迹。
target: Some of his sentimental poems inherit the arrogant style of ancient Chinese literati and scholar-bureaucrats who satirized the government and ridiculed the world, such as "Let the Wind and Rain" written in 1958, "Seven Poems in Memory of Du Shaoling" written in 1960 ", "Three Poems in Memory of Qu Yuan on Duanyang Festival" written in 1961, and "Three Poems in Ode to History" written in 1971, including many famous lines, such as "The world is full of changes, and human relationships are overturned like waves. Nine Autumn Maple Leaf Sutra" The frost is bright, and the pine branches are cold with snow in the twelfth lunar month." With Gong Zizhen, "Kiuzhou relies on wind and thunder for its vitality. It is pitiful to have thousands of horses quivering together." Tan Sitong "Forty million people shed tears together. Where is the world in China?" Lu Xun "can't bear to watch his friends become new ghosts." ", angrily looking for a little poem among the knives" and other good lines are in the same line, which is heart-stirring. . . However, poems with this kind of critical tone have quietly disappeared from my country's literary world since the 1950s.

context:
### Idiom: 金榜挂名
### Meaning: 指科举得中。同金榜题名”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 久旱逢甘霖，他乡遇故知；洞房花烛夜，金榜挂名时。
target: It was long-awaited rain after a long drought; it was meeting old friends in a foreign land; it was the night of the wedding ceremony; it was the day when the names were posted on the golden list.

context:
### Idiom: 突然袭击
### Meaning: 指军事上出其不意地攻击。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 但是我在敏感多疑的同时又很容易获得短暂的满足，经常会因为一些小事，即使是一句话就觉得他好爱我。可是事实上每一个突然袭击我大脑的过往的瞬间又会敲击的我陷入沉思——他真的有他所说的、有我短暂感觉到的那么在乎我吗？。
target: But while I'm sensitive and suspicious, I'm easily satisfied for a short while, often believing he's really into me for little things, even a word. But in reality, every moment that strikes my mind suddenly knocks me into reflection, does he really mean what he says, does he care as much for me as I'm briefly feeling?

context:
### Idiom: 筋疲力尽
### Meaning: 筋肉疲乏，体力竭尽。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 像野性的天使 ，刚筋疲力尽地。完成一场打谷——永恒是打谷完的天色——
target: Like an angel with a wild streak, just exhausted from a harvest.

context:
### Idiom: 一拍即合
### Meaning: 原指一打拍子就合于乐曲的节奏。比喻一下子就能够互相吻合。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 创刊月余后，原为国闻社出资方之一的皖系军阀卢永祥在江浙战争中战败，遂令一社一刊的经费面临断绝。此时天津盐业银行总经理吴鼎昌南来，欲在上海开设四行储蓄会，需要一个发表言论的地方，而吴鼎昌与胡政之本是留日同学，双方一拍即合，由吴每月以广告费名义供给《国闻周报》400元，再加上其他经费来源，使刊物得以支撑发行。《国闻周报》1924年8月在上海创刊。
target: A month after its launch, Lu Yongxiang, a Warlord of the Anhui clique, was defeated in the Jiangsu-Zhejiang War, so the funding for the publication was cut off. At this time, Wu Dingchang, the general manager of the Sichuan Salt Bank in Tianjin came south to open a branch of the Sichuan Salt Bank in Shanghai. He needed a place to express his views, and Wu and Hu Zhengzhi were classmates in Japan. They were in accord, and Wu provided 400 yuan in advertising fees to the newspaper every month, in addition to other sources of funding, which allowed the publication to be sustained. The National News Weekly was launched in Shanghai in August 1924.

context:
### Idiom: 贪心不足
### Meaning: 贪得之心永不满足。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 花钱应有所规划，切莫无所顾忌。投资上见好就收，小心贪心不足蛇吞象。
target: Spend money in a planned way and don’t be careless. When your investment is good, give it up and be careful not to be too greedy.

context:
### Idiom: 不刊之典
### Meaning: 指不能更改或磨灭的有关帝王的记载、钦定典制。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 转任刑部侍郎，集贤学士如故。唐穆宗曾问侍臣：“朕想要学习经史，以何为先？”薛放说“《六经》是先圣之至言，仲尼所发扬阐明，都是天人之极致，真是万代不刊之典。史书记录前代成败得失的事迹，也足以鉴其兴亡。
target: He was transferred to be the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Justice, and remained a Scholar of the Hall of Diligent Government as before. Emperor Tang Muzong once asked his courtiers, "I want to study the classics and history, where should I start?" Xue Fang replied, "The 'Six Classics' are the ultimate words of the ancient sages, promoted and elucidated by Confucius, they are the pinnacle of heaven and man, truly the unalterable canon for all generations. The history books record the deeds of success and failure of previous generations, and are sufficient to reflect their rise and fall."

context:
### Idiom: 寒耕热耘
### Meaning: 泛指农作辛苦。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 35度的天， 阻挡不了热爱欢喜的心， 是夏天的味道到了， 火热且寒耕热耘、酒酣耳热。
target: The 35-degree day, can't stop the passion of love, it's the taste of summer; it's hot and thick and sticky, very boiling and very hot.

context:
### Idiom: 天不作美
### Meaning: 天不成全美事。多指要进行的事情因刮风下雨而受到了影响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 陈楚寰告诉《联合早报》：“开拍前，勋评很有自信地说，在水中只要把我的下巴抬起来，我就不会喝到海水。当日老天不作美，不时下雨，我们赶着拍，没有太多时间彩排。拍摄时，我不知道勋评和鸣杰谁在左谁在右，只知道有一只手掐住我的脖子，我的呼吸不顺畅，一直咳嗽，喝到海水。
target: Chen Chu Xuan told the United Morning Post that just before filming began, Hong boasted confidently that as long as he raised his chin, he would not drink seawater. That day, the weather was not so good, and it rained intermittently. We had to hurry to shoot the film. We didn't have much time to rehearse. During the shooting, I didn't know who was on the left and who was on the right, but I knew that there was a hand pinching my neck. I couldn't breathe smoothly and I kept coughing. I drank seawater.

context:
### Idiom: 邪魔歪道
### Meaning: 指不正当的言行或途径。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 故事世界观：地震、万物皆有灵。日本在文化上来说，可以说是一个充满神灵的国度，根据CHEAP的影片中分享的，过去的中国也曾有许多关于妖怪或神灵的小说或纪载，像是山海经、聊斋等等纪载神灵的书，但因为中国这块神州大地上，自古就是中央集权的体制，一定要展现出主流体制打赢邪魔歪道的故事，导致中国的妖怪常常被绑手绑脚，最后只能被传统社会主流的一方击败或收服，比方说西游记没有妖怪打得赢孙悟空。但是日本的妖怪文化就不同了，因为日本是一个好山好水好无聊......欸不是，是山川水源树林茂密，地震和火山等有各种大自然灾害的国家，所以自古就对大自然充满著敬畏，认为万物皆有灵，石头都可以加以敬拜。
target: The story world view: earthquakes, and everything has a soul. Japan can be said that it is a country full of gods. According to the video shared by CHEAP, there were many stories or records about ghosts or gods in ancient China. For example, Shan Hai Jing, Liaozhai, and other records of gods and ghosts, and because of the centralized authority system in China since ancient times, the mainstream society had to win the evil and malicious forces in the story, so the ghosts in China were often tied up, and finally they were defeated or subdued by the mainstream forces. For example, in Journey to the West, the ghosts could not defeat Xuanzang. However, the ghost culture in Japan is different. Japan is a country full of mountains, rivers, and forests, and there are various natural disasters such as earthquakes and volcanoes. Therefore, people have been full of respect for nature since ancient times, and they believe that everything has a soul, and they even worship stones.

context:
### Idiom: 从容自若
### Meaning: 沉着镇静，神态如常。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 林书豪曾经历了好长一段低潮与伤病，2019年他来台湾进行布道会时曾落泪哽咽：‘美国职篮已经放弃我了！’。但现在，眼前的林书豪从容自若。他之所以愿意接受《今周刊》独家专访，是因为下定决心分享经过磨难试炼后终于找到的答案，一种善用影响力的方法：‘影响力投资’，投资行为在追求资金报酬的同时，也能处理社会与环境上的难题。
target: Jeremy Lin has experienced a long period of lows and injuries. In 2019, when he came to Taiwan for an evangelistic meeting, he broke down in tears, saying, "American professional basketball has given up on me!" But now, the Jeremy Lin in front of us is calm and composed. The reason he agreed to an exclusive interview with "This Week Magazine" is because he is determined to share the answer he finally found after going through trials and tribulations, a method of using influence effectively: "Influence Investment". This investment behavior not only pursues financial returns, but also addresses social and environmental problems.

context:
### Idiom: 指天为誓
### Meaning: 誓发誓。指着天誓。表示意志坚决或对人表示忠诚。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 她贵为相府嫡女，出身高贵，本该是凤命天成，谁知却错把豺狼当良人，为他倾尽所有荡平天下，助他君临九霄，到头来却落得众叛亲离，削骨断面惨死狱中！重生归来，年少慕艾，李锦悠指天为誓——那些辱她的，她必踩在脚下！那些欠她的，她必全部讨回！那些害她的，她必叫其不得好死！只是天降邪王缠上她，这个冷清冷心腹黑狡诈的男人，却独独对她纠缠不休。
target: As the legitimate daughter of the prime minister, she was of noble birth and should have been destined to be a phoenix. However, she mistook the jackal for her beloved. She gave everything she had for him to bring peace to the world and helped him rule the sky. However, in the end, she was betrayed by everyone and died miserably. In prison! After being reborn and admiring Ai at a young age, Li Jinyou swore to the sky that those who insulted her would be trampled under her feet! She will get back everything she owes her! She will give those who harm her a bad death! It's just that the evil king descended from the sky stalked her. This cold, cold, sinister and cunning man only pestered her endlessly.

context:
### Idiom: 一拍即合
### Meaning: 原指一打拍子就合于乐曲的节奏。比喻一下子就能够互相吻合。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 创刊月余后，原为国闻社出资方之一的皖系军阀卢永祥在江浙战争中战败，遂令一社一刊的经费面临断绝。此时天津盐业银行总经理吴鼎昌南来，欲在上海开设四行储蓄会，需要一个发表言论的地方，而吴鼎昌与胡政之本是留日同学，双方一拍即合，由吴每月以广告费名义供给《国闻周报》400元，再加上其他经费来源，使刊物得以支撑发行。《国闻周报》1924年8月在上海创刊。
target: After its inception a few months later, Lu Yongxiang, one of the financiers of the National News Society and a warlord from the Wan System, was defeated in the war between Zhejiang and Jiangsu. This led to the funding for the newspaper and magazine facing a potential cutoff. At this time, Wu Dingchang, the general manager of the Tianjin Salt Industry Bank, traveled south to Shanghai, intending to open the Four Banks Savings Society. He needed a platform to express his opinions. Wu Dingchang and Hu Zheng were already classmates from their time in Japan, and they quickly agreed to work together. Wu provided 400 yuan per month to the "National Weekly News" in the name of advertising fees, supplemented by other sources of funding, allowing the publication to continue its release. The "National Weekly News" was founded in Shanghai in August 1924.

context:
### Idiom: 黑漆一团
### Meaning: ①指墨团。②形容非弛暗，没有一点光明。或对人对事一无所知。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
source: 因为你内心污染得厉害，自己的光明被遮盖住了，佛光想灌都灌不进来。你们打起坐来，不管开眼也好，闭眼也好，黑漆一团，一团乌烟瘴气，这就证明地狱在你面前。等你定慧到了，只要一定，自身光明随时都可以跟佛的光明相接！
target: Because your inner decay is so great, your own light is covered up, the light of the Buddha can't reach you. When you stand up, whether open or closed, a black mass, a gray cloud, it shows that hell is in front of you. When you reach a certainty, your own light can always be connected to the light of the Buddha.
